items.sentence: I asked Tom to tell me why he didn't do that.
I can definitely do that better than Tom can.
Tom spoke no French the first time I met him.
Tom likes to show everybody how strong he is.
I want to believe that what Tom said is true.
He tried to imagine what the client was like.
I promised Tom that I'd go shopping with him.
I hope we can figure out a way to solve this.
I heard Tom has married a very wealthy woman.
I have the impression that Tom is doing well.
